member.name: T:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream
member.summary: A wrapper for that makes it easier and faster to work with bencode and to read/write one byte at a time. Also has methods for peeking at the next byte (caching the read) and for reading the previous byte in stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new by converting the string to bytes using and storing them in a .

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates a new by converting the string to bytes using the specified encoding and storing them in a .

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new from the specified bytes using a as the .

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new using the specified stream.
member.param: The underlying stream to use.
Indicates if the specified stream should be left open when this is disposed.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.InnerStream
member.summary: The inner stream that this is working with.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.LeaveOpen
member.summary: If true will not be disposed when this is disposed.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Length
member.summary: Gets the lenght in bytes of the stream.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position within the stream.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.EndOfStream
member.summary: Indicates if the current position is at or after the end of the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Sets the position within the stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the parameter.
A value indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Peek
member.summary: Reads the next byte in the stream without advancing the position. This can safely be called multiple times as the read byte is cached until the position in the stream is changed or a read operation is performed.
member.returns: The next byte in the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.PeekChar
member.summary: Reads the next char in the stream without advancing the position. This can safely be called multiple times as the read char is cached until the position in the stream is changed or a read operation is performed.
member.returns: The next char in the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Read
member.summary: Reads the next byte in the stream. If a or a has been performed the peeked value is returned and the position is incremented by 1.
member.returns: The next b√Ωte in the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.ReadChar
member.summary: Reads the next char in the stream. If a or a has been performed the peeked value is returned and the position is incremented by 1.
member.returns: The next char in the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Read(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the specified amount of bytes from the stream.
member.param: The number of bytes to read.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.ReadPrevious
member.summary: Reads the previous byte in the stream and decrements the position by 1.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.ReadPreviousChar
member.summary: Reads the previous char in the stream and decrements the position by 1.
member.returns: The previous char in the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Write(System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a number to the stream.
member.param: The number to write to the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Write(System.Int64)
member.summary: Writes the number to the stream.
member.param: The number to write to the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Write(System.Char)
member.summary: Writes a char to the stream.
member.param: The char to write to the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Write(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes an array of bytes to the stream.
member.param: The bytes to write to the stream.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the stream and advances the position by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes to copy from.
The zero-based offset in to start copying from to the stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the stream

member.name: M:BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream.Flush
member.summary: Clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the . is also disposed unless is true.

member.summary: Disposes of unless is true.

member.summary: Possible options for controlling magnet link generation.

member.name: F:BencodeNET.Torrents.MagnetLinkOptions.None
member.summary: Results in the bare minimum magnet link containing only info hash and display name.

member.name: F:BencodeNET.Torrents.MagnetLinkOptions.IncludeTrackers
member.summary: Includes trackers in the magnet link.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo
member.summary: File info for files in a multi-file torrents. This
member.remarks: Corresponds to an entry in the 'info.files' list field in a torrent.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo.FileName
member.summary: The file name. It just returns the last part of .

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo.FileSize
member.summary: The file size in bytes.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo.Md5Sum
member.summary: [optional] 32-character hexadecimal string corresponding to the MD5 sum of the file. Rarely used.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo.Path
member.summary: A list of file path elements.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfo.FullPath
member.summary: The full path of the file including file name.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.MultiFileInfoList
member.summary: A list of file info for the files included in a multi-file torrent.

member.summary: The file name. This is purely advisory.

member.summary: The file size in bytes.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.SingleFileInfo.Md5Sum
member.summary: [optional] 32-character hexadecimal string corresponding to the MD5 sum of the file. Rarely used.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.#ctor(BencodeNET.Objects.BDictionary)
member.summary: Creates a torrent and populates the and properties from the provided .

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.OriginalInfoHash
member.summary: The original info hash value from when the torrent was parsed. This will be null if the instance was created manually and not by the parser.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.OriginalInfoHashBytes
member.summary: The original info hash bytes from when the torrent was parsed. This will be null if the instance was created manually and not by the parser.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.ExtraFields
member.summary: Add any custom fields to this and they will be merged with the torrent data when encoded.
member.remarks: Existing keys will be overwritten with the values from this property. In the case the existing and new value are both the new list will be appended to the existing list. In the case the existing and new value are both they will be merged recursively.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.Trackers
member.summary: A list of list of trackers (announce URLs). Lists are processed in order of first to last. Trackers in a list are processed randomly.

remarks.para: The lists will be processed by clients in order of first to last. For each list the trackers will be processed in random order until one is successful. If no trackers in the first list responds, the next list is attempted etc.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.File
member.summary: File info for the file in the torrent. Will be null for multi-file torrents.
member.remarks: Corresponds to the 'info' field in a single-file torrent.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.Files
member.summary: A list of file info for the files in the torrent. Will be null for single-file torrents.
member.remarks: Corresponds to the 'info' field in a multi-file torrent.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.FileMode
member.summary:
The file mode of the torrent. Torrents can be either single-file or multi-file and the content of the 'info' differs depending on this.
If Single then the property is populated. if Multi then the property is populated.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.DisplayName
member.summary: Returns the "display name" of the torrent. For single-file torrents this is the file name of that file. For multi-file torrents this is the directory name.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.CreationDate
member.summary: [optional] The creation date of the torrent.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.Comment
member.summary: [optional] Torrent comment.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.CreatedBy
member.summary: [optional] The name and version of the program used to create this torrent.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.Encoding
member.summary: [optional] Indicates the encoding used to store the strings in this torrents.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.PieceSize
member.summary: The size in bytes of each file piece (piece length).

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.Pieces
member.summary: A concatenation of all 20-byte SHA1 hash values (one for each piece). Use to get/set this value as a hex string instead.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.PiecesAsHexString
member.summary: Gets or sets from/to a hex string (without dashes), e.g. 1C115D26444AEF2A5E936133DCF8789A552BBE9F[...]. The length of the string must be a multiple of 40.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.IsPrivate
member.summary: [optional] If set to true clients must only publish it's presence to the defined trackers. Mainly used for private trackers which don't allow PEX, DHT etc.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.TotalSize
member.summary: The total size in bytes of the included files.

member.name: P:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.NumberOfPieces
member.summary: The total number of file pieces.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.ToBDictionary
member.summary: Converts the torrent to a .

member.summary: Creates the 'info' part of the torrent.
member.param: The encoding used for writing strings
member.returns: A of the 'info' part of the torrent

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.GetInfoHash
member.summary: Calculates the info hash of the torrent. This is used when communicating with trackers. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the value of the 'info' of the torrent.
member.returns: A string representation of a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the value of the 'info' part

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.GetInfoHashBytes
member.summary: Calculates the info hash of the torrent. This is used when communicating with trackers. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the value of the 'info' of the torrent.
member.returns: A 20-byte SHA1 hash of the value of the 'info' part

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.GetMagnetLink(BencodeNET.Torrents.MagnetLinkOptions)
member.summary: Creates a Magnet link in the BTIH (BitTorrent Info Hash) format: xt=urn:btih:{info hash}

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent.EncodeObject(BencodeNET.IO.BencodeStream)
member.summary: Encodes the torrent and writes it to the stream.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFields
member.summary: A reference of default torrent field names.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentInfoFields
member.summary: A reference of default torrent fields names in the 'info'-dictionary.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFilesFields
member.summary: A reference of default torrent fields in the dictionaries in the 'files'-list in the 'info'-dictionary.s

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFileMode
member.summary: Indicates the torrent file mode. Torrents are structured differently if it is either single-file or multi-file.

member.name: F:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFileMode.Unknown
member.summary: Torrent file mode could not be determined and is most likely invalid.

member.name: F:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFileMode.Single
member.summary: Single-file torrent. Contains only a single file.

member.name: F:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentFileMode.Multi
member.summary: Multi-file torrent. Can contain multiple files and a parent directory name for all included files.

member.name: T:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil
member.summary: Utility class for doing torrent-related work like calculating info hash and creating magnet links.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CalculateInfoHash(BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent)
member.summary:
Calculates the info hash of the torrent. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the 'info'-dictionary of the torrent used to uniquely identify it and it's contents.
Example: 6D60711ECF005C1147D8973A67F31A11454AB3F5
member.param: The torrent to calculate the info hash for.
member.returns: A string representation of the 20-byte SHA1 hash without dashes.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CalculateInfoHashBytes(BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent)
member.summary:
Calculates the info hash of the torrent. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the 'info'-dictionary of the torrent used to uniquely identify it and it's contents.
Example: 6D60711ECF005C1147D8973A67F31A11454AB3F5
member.param: The torrent to calculate the info hash for.
member.returns: A byte-array of the 20-byte SHA1 hash.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CalculateInfoHash(BencodeNET.Objects.BDictionary)
member.summary:
Calculates the hash of the 'info'-dictionary. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the 'info'-dictionary of the torrent used to uniquely identify it and it's contents.
Example: 6D60711ECF005C1147D8973A67F31A11454AB3F5
member.param: The 'info'-dictionary of a torrent.
member.returns: A string representation of the 20-byte SHA1 hash without dashes.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CalculateInfoHashBytes(BencodeNET.Objects.BDictionary)
member.summary:
Calculates the hash of the 'info'-dictionary. The info hash is a 20-byte SHA1 hash of the 'info'-dictionary of the torrent used to uniquely identify it and it's contents.
Example: 6D60711ECF005C1147D8973A67F31A11454AB3F5
member.param: The 'info'-dictionary of a torrent.
member.returns: A byte-array of the 20-byte SHA1 hash.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.BytesToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts the byte array to a hexadecimal string representation without hyphens.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CreateMagnetLink(BencodeNET.Torrents.Torrent,BencodeNET.Torrents.MagnetLinkOptions)
member.summary: Creates a Magnet link in the BTIH (BitTorrent Info Hash) format: xt=urn:btih:{info hash}
member.param: Torrent to create Magnet link for.
Controls how the Magnet link is constructed.

member.name: M:BencodeNET.Torrents.TorrentUtil.CreateMagnetLink(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},BencodeNET.Torrents.MagnetLinkOptions)
member.summary: Creates a Magnet link in the BTIH (BitTorrent Info Hash) format: xt=urn:btih:{info hash}
member.param: The info has of the torrent.
The display name of the torrent. Usually the file name or directory name for multi-file torrents
A list of trackers if any.
Controls how the Magnet link is constructed.
